server_configuration_installation_form_r: RTM enables you to monitor your server and the activity of its components (processor, RAM, disk partition, etc.). If you enable this option, the RTM agent will be installed by default.
Click here to read the documentation
server_configuration_installation_form_p: You can enter the URL for a post-installation script here. It will help you complete the system installation. This way, you can easily configure your preferences and install software programs. Important: The execution time for a script is 1 hour maximum.
It is all or part of the expected result on the standard output following the execution of the script. You can leave this field empty, but we do not recommend doing this.

RAID

With RAID (starting from RAID 1), you can replicate data on multiple hard disks, to improve the server's data backup in the event of failure. Important: RAID 0 does not back up the data. For this reason, it is not recommended.
Partition size
This size is the space that can be taken up by your data.
Space used

The sizes will vary depending on the RAID you use. If you have a server with 2 hard disks, a RAID 1 duplicates the data from a partition on to the 2 disks, doubling the space used as a result. If one of the 2 disks becomes faulty, the data is not lost.

This mount point cannot be used - the name is incorrect. Special characters cannot be used (excluding _ / and -), and the maximum number of characters is 255.
